QuestionTxt: As for their effect on your own way of life in the next few years, say within 10 years, how would you rate the importance of each of the following topics...very important, of some importance, or not particularly important?...Anti-trust activities and legislation
SourceDoc: General Electric Quarterly Survey 68-03 - National sample
SampleDesc: National adult, including an oversample of 258 Black Americans (respondents who were identified as "Negro" by interviewers) and 441 college students
